${ModID}:S_r_ke.NAME: S r ke
${ModID}:S_r_ke.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !M! ${ModID}:Distortion。

${ModID}:Deconstruct.NAME: Deconstruct
${ModID}:Deconstruct.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! ${ModID}:Distortion to 所有敌人. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Darken.NAME: Darken
${ModID}:Darken.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! ${ModID}:Distortion. If the enemy has another debuff, 给予 !${ModID}:m2! more。

${ModID}:BurningAct.NAME: Burning Act
${ModID}:BurningAct.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 消耗 2 of them randomly。
${ModID}:BurningAct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 消耗 2 of them。

${ModID}:MindMaze.NAME: Mind Maze
${ModID}:MindMaze.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 X times. NL Put X *Dazed on top of your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:Deterioration.NAME: Deterioration
${ModID}:Deterioration.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时， 消耗 a random card in your 弃牌堆 and 获得 !M! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
${ModID}:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害 for each time the enemy has lost 生命 本回合。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害 for each time the enemy has lost 生命 本回合. NL (Hits !M! time{!M!|1=|@=s}.)

${ModID}:Rue.NAME: Rue
${ModID}:Rue.DESCRIPTION: {@@}获得 [E] [E] and 抽 !M! 张牌{!M!|>1=s}. NL 消耗 the next 3 cards you play。

${ModID}:Static.NAME: Static
${ModID}:Static.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 to a random enemy !M! times. 给予 ${ModID}:Distortion equal to the un格挡ed damage dealt。

${ModID}:CursedCircle.NAME: Cursed Circle
${ModID}:CursedCircle.DESCRIPTION: You and 所有敌人 失去 力量 本回合 equal to the number of cards in your hand. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:CursedCircle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You and 所有敌人 失去 力量 本回合 equal to the number of cards in your hand。
